column5: Ok so she's not really famous, but you guys are always telling me to get her on tv and though it's not TV she did make her first cameo in a fishing vid...    She's on just before the 30 second mark!   you might also recognize the good lookin' dude in the black t-shirt....  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dxUlf_PnTpc&feature=related  Cheers, Ryan

She's a natural...imagine the gills she could catch with that combo. oops i mean "system".  Hope she gets one as payment for her cameo. Is my computer dying again or is the audio a touch off in that vid?
hahaha. first she's reppin the facts of fishing jersey, now she's gettin spots on the show! i want her autograph before she gets her own show!
She could be the next Maryko Izumi, except she'll know how to fish.  JF
Geeee, I wonder why Mariko has her own show
Very cool!  I want that fishing rod/reel combo as well!
Congrads kiddo, she could become a actress ya know
Nuffin' like Milli Vanilli.  I don't do as much ultralite (is that word aloud?) as I used to, maybe I'll get back to it.
It sure ain't for her fishing skill. It's more about the belly button I suspect. Not that that's a bad thing, mind you.  JF
Congrats to Averie!  I'm sure she loves it.
Awesome Ryan, she's a "cutie"!!! Now answer, the question everyone really wants to know...does Dave practise that crazy laugh, or does it come naturally...
Thanks for the replies guys! Haha Averie loves it!  And yeah Frankie that's Dave's real laugh!

Heh, I know you're his cameraman, so you obviously know, but you're not the first person I've heard this from.  I know a few guys who fished the Shimano invitational tournament in NY with him this year and they couldn't get over that that's his real laugh.
